description: The image shows a street view of a fast food restaurant named 'Mr Egg', which specializes in burgers, kebabs, and chicken. The restaurant has a bright red sign with yellow lettering and illustrations of an egg. It is located in an urban setting with other businesses visible in the background, including a shop named 'Harmony 88'. A man is walking by the restaurant, and there are cars parked on the street in front of it.
